title: Definitions
context: ยง341-2 Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Center&rdquo; means the University of Hawaii environmental center established in section [304A-1551]. &ldquo;Council&rdquo; means the environmental council established in section 341-3&copy;. &ldquo;Director&rdquo; means the director of environmental quality control. &ldquo;Office&rdquo; means the office of environmental quality control established in section 341-3(a). &ldquo;University&rdquo; means the University of Hawaii. [L 1970, c 132, pt of ยง1; am L 2006, c 75, ยง12] Revision Note In definition of &ldquo;center&rdquo;, &ldquo;environmental center&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;ecology or environmental center&rdquo;.
